ABOUT NAFTECH

With a team of over 30 members and climbing, the Technology Department at New American Funding has a long and rich history of creating innovative products for loan officers, marketing, accounting, and nearly every department within the organization, and have no plans of slowing down.

The Tech Department has a robust pipeline and backlog of advanced products that will utilize the latest technology platforms, and will continue to partner with New American Funding management to reach the missions and goals to becoming the nation's top mortgage lender.

WHAT WE ARE WORKING ON

New American Funding's legacy CRM, Bankerview, is an enterprise-level system created by our in-house developers to facilitate the management of loan officer pipelines, commissions, email campaigns, accounting, marketing, and so much more. The flagship product of the Technology Department, Bankerview was created with the flexibility to be easily customizable with new features and enhancements to meet business growing and changing needs.

Product Description

Banker View is a propriety Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system, designed to assist Loan Officers and other team members in managing documents, organizing their work day and communicating clearly and quickly with all parties of a deal or loan. Bankerview provides the opportunity to work smarter, not harder and allows the Loan Officer to focus on selling more loans.

Features & Benefits

Loan Office Pipeline Management

  • Automated email campaigns
  • Prospect Management - from lead to loan, manage every aspect of your prospects file in a single place
  • Email templates - select from over 500 customizable email templates for leads, prospects, partners and more
  • Text Messaging capabilities - chat with your borrowers the way they want to be communicated to
  • Milestone notifications - know the status of all of your loans as they work through the process; borrower and RE partners are also notified every step of the way
  • Notes and event memorialization - keep track of all of the activity that pertains to your prospects and loans
  • Tasks and auto reminders - set follow up reminders and tasks so nothing is missed or falls behind
  • GoGo Dial & Broadcast - auto dial your prospects and partners or leave single or bulk voicemails for your selected recipients

Real Estate Partner

  • Partner validation
  • Co-branded marketing campaigns

Recruiting Tools

  • Recruiting campaigns
  • Agent Intelligence portal
  • List import

Product Roadmap

  • BV Deployment Phase 1

New American Funding's answer for enhancing our customers mortgage application experience, GoGoApply was created as an online 'smart' application that is a dynamic and intuitive software solution so prospective borrowers can submit a mortgage application and accompanying assets and documents with the click of a few buttons. The application and documents are integrated with our LOS system so the next steps of our processing of an application can begin. GoGoApply is fully customizable with a rich set of upcoming enhancements to continually elevate the customer and loan officer experience.

Product Description

GoGoApply is a consumer-facing, smart 1003 that is simple to use, safe for anyone to complete from anywhere, and secure so client’s personal information doesn’t get into the wrong hands. With 24/7 access to this digital, dynamic, mobile responsive and intelligent mortgage application, our borrowers can complete it at their own pace, on their own time on virtually any device.

Features & Benefits

Consumer Benefits

  • Dynamic loan application: Provides an intuitive application that only asks questions that is personalized to the borrowers' unique scenario.
  • Personalized condition list: Real-time needs list allows you to know exactly what is required to submit your loan application to get approved!
  • Real-Time Status: Status Update: know what the status of your loan application any time from any device.
  • Automated communication: when your loan achieves milestone have automated updates to make sure you are always in the know.
  • Data from the source: Asset Statements, W2's, Pay-stubs, and Tax Returns - Eliminating the paper and pain from the loan process.
  • Centralized communication platform: Connect all the ‘key players’ in one simple, smart, and safe digital experience.
  • Keep your personal information safe: Digital upload and direct data aggregation keep the borrower's information in front of the hands and eyes of only those professionals with the authority to process the loan.

Loan Officer Benefits

  • Dynamic loan application: Complete application with all applicable questions being asked; questions that seem to come up a week into the loan process – by asking these questions up front, like do you pay child support or alimony, etc. – can avoid issues downstream In addition, a comprehensive needs list built in real time enables the borrower to collect all the needed conditions at one time to get to underwriting faster.
  • Centralized communication platform: An interactive way to communicate with the borrower on items that are needed with automated reminders to the borrower. Also, automate communication with referral partners and borrower with milestones updates.
  • Real-Time Status Updates: The borrower can check their loan progress 24/7 providing transparency and confidence that their loan is on pace to close on time, avoiding questions like, "where is my loan at?""
